testcaseName: Adult Patient has received PCV13 but has no history of PPSV23
generalDescription: This test case describes the assessment of a patient > age 65 years with a history of PCV13 vaccine, but no history of the PPSV23 vaccine.
reasonForChange: New test case for version 2.0 which expanded scope into Adult recommendations. Update due to  MMWR (9/4/2015 / Vol.64 / No. 34) changing the minimal and recommended interval from PCV13 to PPSV23 in adults 65+ from 6-12 months to 1 year.
